alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Sevier Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 20 at 10:55AM MDT until August 21 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of Utah, including the following areas, Central Mountains, Eastern Juab/Millard Counties, Sanpete Valley and Sevier Valley. * WHEN...Through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, recently burned areas, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A renewed monsoonal surge combined with the lingering moisture from Hurricane Hilary will bring a continued threat of flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Sevier Valley
